label: sodium lauryl sulfate
description: SLS is a known irritant to our eyes and skin. Other findings suggest that SLS can cause cancer in an animal. In addition to that, production of SLS might leave a trace of 1,4-Dioxane. Some products that contain SLS was discovered to contain up to 279 ppm of 1,4-Dioxane. 1,4-Dioxane was discovered as a potential carcinogen. In other words, SLS might contribute indirectly to the development of cancer.

label: Cocamidopropyl Betaine
description: The main danger to Cocamidopropyl betaine or CAPB is it potential to become an irritant to our skin and eye. In addition to that, it also can cause allergic to some people if they interact with it. This chemical compound is actually voted as Allergen of the Year in 2004 by the American Contact Dermatitis Society because of the numerous allergic case related with CAPB.

label: Triclosan
description: t’s a chemical antibacterial agent known to cause hormone disruptions, which can lead to cancer and affect fetal development, among other things.

label: Polysorbates
description: Polysorbates can leave a residue on our skin or scalp, which will disturb the skin’s natural pH balance. It will also destroy our skin and scalp natural protective barrier. To what extent polysorbates can damage us is debatable. It is suggested that polysorbates can cause irritation to some people. Therefore, you should be careful in using polysorbates.

label: Polyethylene Glycol
description: Some research suggests that PEG contains dangerous dioxin levels, found as a by-product of the ethoxylation process in its manufacturing process. Dioxins have a direct link to cancer development. In other words, PEG might contribute indirectly to the increase of cancer development.

label: Potassium Sorbate
description: The main danger of potassium sorbate is skin irritation and toxicity to our organ. It is better if you avoid potassium sorbate if you have irritation to it.

label: Phenoxyethanol
description: Some research suggests that phenoxyethanol can cause irritation to the eyes, lungs, or skin. It might even cause a shut down of the CNS, contact dermatitis, and also vomiting.

label: Retinyl Palmitate
description: High doses of retinol are linked to speeding up cancer in lab animals. In addition to that, National Toxicology Program at the US concluded that the addition of retinyl palmitate exacerbated the frequency and rate of tumors. To put it simply, retinyl palmitate is a potential carcinogen that can cause cancer. Other danger of retinyl palmitate might include reproductive toxicity and organ toxicity.

label: Dimethicone
description: Dimethicone can cause the skin and scalp become incredibly dry. In some case, it might cause irritation to the skin, eye, and scalp. It will also form a barrier on the outside of the skin that traps bacteria, sebum, and impurities. For the environment, it can become a pollutant that is hard to degrade to the environment.
